cookies: has given you a chocolate chip cookie!
has given you a soft homemade oatmeal cookie!
has given you a plain, dry, old cookie. It was the last one in the bag. Gross.
gives you a sugar cookie. What, no frosting and sprinkles? 0/10 would not touch.
gives you a chocolate chip cookie. Oh wait, those are raisins. Bleck!
gives you an enormous cookie. Poking it gives you more cookies. Weird.
gives you a fortune cookie. It reads "Why aren't you working on any projects?"
gives you a fortune cookie. It reads "Give that special someone a compliment"
gives you a fortune cookie. It reads "Take a risk!"
gives you a fortune cookie. It reads "Go outside."
gives you a fortune cookie. It reads "Don't forget to eat your veggies!"
gives you a fortune cookie. It reads "Do you even lift?"
gives you a fortune cookie. It reads "m808 pls"
gives you a fortune cookie. It reads "If you move your hips, you'll get all the ladies."
gives you a fortune cookie. It reads "I love you."
gives you a Golden Cookie. You can't eat it because it is made of gold. Dammit.
gives you an Oreo cookie with a glass of milk!
gives you a rainbow cookie made with love :heart:
gives you an old cookie that was left out in the rain, it's moldy.
bakes you fresh cookies, it smells amazing.
langerror: /me »ArkhamBot»  @%%NAME%% >> The language you've selected isn't available. Please visit %%LINK%% to find a list of languages available.
greyuser: Only bouncers and up can run a bot.
bouncer: The bot can't move people when it's run as a bouncer.
songknown: /me »ArkhamBot»  @%%NAME%% >> This song is in the DJ history.
notavailable: /me »ArkhamBot»  @%%NAME%% >> The song you played was not available.
timelimit: /me »ArkhamBot»  @%%NAME%% >> Your song is longer than the allowed time! (%%MAXLENGTH%%)
permissionownsong: /me »ArkhamBot»  :up: @%%NAME%% has permission to play their own production!
isblacklisted: /me »ArkhamBot»  This track is on the %%BLACKLIST%% blacklist! Skipping...
isopen: /me »ArkhamBot» [ROULETTE] The ROULETTE has started! One random user who joins is moved to a random position! To join, type !join
ball: /me [8Ball] @%%NAME%%, you asked the magic 8 ball "%%QUESTION%%"... The magic 8 ball replies with,
ghosting: @%%NAME1%% >> %%NAME2%% is either ghosting or not here.
alreadyadding: /me »ArkhamBot»  @%%NAME%% >> User is already being added! Changed the desired position to %%POSITION%%.
adding: /me »ArkhamBot»  @%%NAME%% >> Added to the queue. Current queue: %%POSITION%%.
notdisconnected: /me »ArkhamBot»  @%%NAME%% >> You did not disconnect during my time here.
noposition: /me »ArkhamBot»  @%%NAME%% >> No last position known. The waitlist needs to update at least once to register a user's last position.
toolongago: /me »ArkhamBot»  @%%NAME%% >> Your last disconnect (DC or leave) was too long ago (%%TIME%%).
valid: /me »ArkhamBot»  @%%NAME%% >> You disconnected %%TIME%% ago and should be at position %%POSITION%%.
warning1: /me »ArkhamBot»  @%%NAME%% >> You have been afk for %%TIME%%, please respond within 2 minutes or you will be removed.
warning2: /me »ArkhamBot»  @%%NAME%% >> You will be removed due to AFK soon if you don't respond.
afkremove: /me »ArkhamBot»  @%%NAME%% >> You have been removed for being afk for %%TIME%%. You were at position %%POSITION%%. Chat at least once every %%MAXIMUMAFK%% minutes if you want to play a song.
roomadvertising: /me »ArkhamBot»  @%%NAME%% >> Don't post links to other rooms.
adfly: /me »ArkhamBot»  @%%NAME%% >> Please change your autowoot program. We suggest PlugCubed: http://plugcubed.net/
whois: /me »ArkhamBot»  @%%NAME1%% >> Username: %%NAME2%%, ID: %%ID%%, Rank: %%RANK%%, Joined: %%JOINED%%, Level: %%LEVEL%%, Language: %%LANGUAGE%%, Avatar: %%AVATAR%%, Profile: %%PROFILE%%
newblacklisted: /me »ArkhamBot»  @%%NAME%% >> This track exists on the %%BLACKLIST%% blacklist! [ %%AUTHOR%% - %%TITLE%% - %%MID%% ]
voteskiplimit: /me »ArkhamBot»  @%%NAME%% >> Voteskip limit is currently set to %%LIMIT%% mehs.
voteskipexceededlimit: /me »ArkhamBot»  @%%NAME%% >> Your song has exceeded the voteskip limit (%%LIMIT%% mehs).
voteskipinvalidlimit: /me »ArkhamBot»  @%%NAME%% >> Invalid voteskip limit, please try again using a number to signify the number of mehs.
activeusersintime: /me »ArkhamBot»  @%%NAME%% >> There have been %%AMOUNT%% users chatting in the past %%TIME%% minutes.
maximumafktimeset: /me »ArkhamBot»  @%%NAME%% >> Maximum afk duration set to %%TIME%% minutes.
inactivelonger: /me »ArkhamBot»  @%%NAME%% >> %%USERNAME%% has been inactive longer than %%BOTNAME%%'s been online.
autowoot: /me »ArkhamBot»  We recommend PlugCubed for autowooting: http://plugcubed.net/
brandambassador: /me »ArkhamBot»  A Brand Ambassador is the voice of the plug.dj users. They promote events, engage the community and share the plug.dj message around the world. For more info: https://plug.dj/ba
bouncerplusrank: /me »ArkhamBot»  @%%NAME%% >> You have to be manager or up to enable Bouncer+.
nousercookie: /em I don't see %%NAME%% in room. I'll just eat that cookie.
selfcookie: /me »ArkhamBot»  @%%NAME%% >> You're trying to give a cookie to yourself? That's rude! Sharing is caring!
cycleguardtime: /me »ArkhamBot»  @%%NAME%% >> The cycleguard is set to %%TIME%% minute(s).
dclookuprank: /me »ArkhamBot»  @%%NAME%% >> Only bouncers and above can do a lookup for others.
notinwaitlist: /me »ArkhamBot»  @%%NAME%% >> Well... How am I supposed to get your eta if you're not in the whitelist? Hm?
youarenext: /me »ArkhamBot»  @%%NAME%% >> You're next! Ensure you have the correct song!
youaredj: /me »ArkhamBot»  @%%NAME%% >> You're playing right now! Where have you been?
eta: /me »ArkhamBot»  [@%%NAME%%] Your in position %%POSITION%%. You should reach the booth in %%TIME%%.
starterhelp: /me »ArkhamBot»  Visit the following link, this will get you started on PlugDJ. %%LINK%%
roulettejoin: @%%NAME%% >> You joined the ROULETTE! You will be moved to a RANDOM position if you win!
jointime: /me »ArkhamBot»  @%%NAMEFROM%% >> %%USERNAME%% has been in the room for %%TIME%%.
kickrank: /me »ArkhamBot»  @%%NAME%% >> You can't kick users with an equal or higher rank than you!
kick: /me »ArkhamBot»  @%%NAME%% >> @%%USERNAME%% you are being kicked from the community for %%TIME%% minutes.
skippos: /me »ArkhamBot»  @%%NAME%% >> DJs will now be moved to position %%POSITION%% when skipped.
lockguardtime: /me »ArkhamBot»  @%%NAME%% >> The lockguard is set to %%TIME%% minute(s).
maxlengthtime: /me »ArkhamBot»  @%%NAME%% >> The maximum song duration is set to %%TIME%% minutes.
addbotwaitlist: /me »ArkhamBot»  @%%NAME%% >> Don't try to add me to the waitlist, please.
mutedmaxtime: /me »ArkhamBot»  @%%NAME%% >> You can only mute for maximum %%TIME%% minutes.
muterank: /me »ArkhamBot»  @%%NAME%% >> You can't mute persons with an equal or higher rank than you.
reload: /me »ArkhamBot»  Reloading the bot... (This is not suggested. If problems occur, type !refresh)
removenotinwl: /me »ArkhamBot»  @%%NAME%% >> Specified user %%USERNAME%% is not in the waitlist.
roomrules: /me »ArkhamBot»  Please find the room rules here: %%LINK%%
sessionstats: /me »ArkhamBot»  @%%NAME%% >> Total woots: %%WOOTS%%, total mehs: %%MEHS%%, total grabs: %%GRABS%%.
madeby: /me »ArkhamBot»  @%%NAME%% >> This bot is maintained by SkillsAura.
swapinvalid: /me »ArkhamBot»  @%%NAME%% >> Invalid user specified. (No names with spaces!)
swapwlonly: /me »ArkhamBot»  @%%NAME%% >> Please only swap users that are in the waitlist!
genres: /me »ArkhamBot»  Please find the permitted room genres here: %%LINK%%
unmuteeveryonerank: /me »ArkhamBot»  @%%NAME%% >> Only managers and up can unmute everyone at once.
unmuterank: /me »ArkhamBot»  @%%NAME%% >> You can't unmute persons with an equal or higher rank than you.
commandscd: /me »ArkhamBot»  @%%NAME%% >> The cooldown for commands by users is now set to %%TIME%% seconds.
youtube: /me »ArkhamBot»  @%%NAME%% >> Subscribe to us on YouTube: Serayne92
